entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 1:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -25.7°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
